name: Iceland
visaRequirements: Schengen Visa required for most non-EU citizens

about.description: Iceland is a island nation in the north Atlantic Ocean. It is known for its unique natural landscape, including volcanoes, glaciers, and hot springs.

travelTips.bestTimeToVisit: June-September for hiking September - April for Northern Lights
transportation: You will need a car to explore the country
There are some local transport to famous attractions but they are limited and expensive
culturalNotes: Dress warmly as you will see extreme weather in a day even during summer months
Respect the nature and the wildlife
Drive safely as there are a lot of sheeps near the roads roaming freely
